articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
Sariwon, December 18 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to centenarian woman Kim Yong Dok residing in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province.
					 She, who was born into a poor peasant family in Hwangju County, North Hwanghae Province on Dec. 18, Juche 4 (1915), was subject to all sorts of maltreatment and exploitation under the Japanese imperialist rule.
					
					 It was not until the liberation of Korea by President Kim Il Sung that she enjoyed dignity and a worthy life as human being.
					
					 She made sincere efforts to carry out her work and contributed to the agricultural production after becoming a pensioner.
					
					 She has had a balanced diet and leads an optimistic life. She raised many children and sent them to the posts of national defence and labor-consuming fields. She always calls upon them to uphold the socialist system.

articles.title: Greetings to Emir of Qatar
articles.content:
Greetings to Emir of Qatar
Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Friday sent a message of greeting to Tamim Bin Hamad Al-Thani, emir of the State of Qatar, on its independence day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, sincerely wishing the emir good health and happiness and the friendly people of Qatar greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to PM of Qatar
articles.content:
Greetings to PM of Qatar
Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Friday sent a message of greeting to Abdullah Bin Nasser Bin Khalifa Al Thani, prime minister and minister of Interior of the State of Qatar, on its independence day.
					 The message wished the prime minister big success in his work for development and prosperity of the country, expressing belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily grow stronger in various fields.

articles.title: Korea's Custom of Making Kimchi Listed as World Heritage
articles.content:
Korea's Custom of Making Kimchi Listed as World Heritage
Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation's custom of making kimchi was registered as a typical intangible cultural heritage of humanity at the 10th Session of the Intergovernmental Committee for the Safeguarding of the Intangible Cultural Heritage of the UNESCO held in Namibia from Nov. 30 to Dec. 4.
					 In this regard, Ro Chol Su, deputy director of the DPRK's National Authority for the Protection of Cultural Heritage, told KCNA:
					
					 The news delights the people in the DPRK like last year that witnessed the registration of Korea's folk song "Arirang" as a world intangible heritage.
					
					 Kimchi has a long history of its development in Korea. From olden times, Koreans have made kimchi (pickled vegetables) for subsidiary foods to be taken in winter and spring.
					
					 Now, it is a custom of Koreans to take kimchi in daily diet, regarding it as a must dish.
					
					 Kimchi is diverse in variety and method of making for every season. Its variety includes watery kimchi made of sliced radish and diced radish pickles for late spring, diced cucumber and radish pickles and kimchi made of parsley for summer and whole cabbage kimchi for autumn.
					
					 The Korean people pay special attention to preparing kimchi for winter season in particular.

articles.title: DPRK Sportspersons Win about 250 Medals in 2015 Int'l Games
articles.content:
DPRK Sportspersons Win about 250 Medals in 2015 Int'l Games
Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK sportspersons bagged about 250 medals including over 90 gold medals in the international games this year, displaying the honor of the country.
					 The DPRK woman footballers scored three straight wins in EAFF 2015 East Asia Cup, creating a sports myth.
					
					 Kim Hye Gyong came first at the 15th Asian Marathon Championship and the 2015 Hong Kong Marathon.
					
					 Kim Kuk Hyang placed first at the women's 10m platform diving finals of the 16th FINA World Championships held in Kazan, Russia in July.
					
					 The DPRK women's football teams won at the 2015 AFC U-14 Girl Regional Championship (East Asia) and the 2015 AFC U-16 Women's Championship.
					
					 DPRK weightlifters proved successful at the 2015 World Weightlifting Championship held in the U.S.
					
					 Om Yun Chol jerked 171 kg in the 56kg category of men's weightlifting, setting a new world record and winning two gold medals.
					
					 DPRK player Ri Se Gwang placed first at the men's vault event of the 46th Artistic Gymnastics World Championships held in UK, becoming twice world champion.
					
					 DPRK weightlifter Pak Jong Ju bagged three gold medals at the 2015 World Youth Weightlifting Championship and Kang Yong Mi won a gold medal in the woman uneven bar at the 2015 FIG artistic gymnastic world challenge cup and Kwak Chol bagged a gold medal in the international boxing tournament named after Konstantin Korotkov.
					
					 The DPRK players bagged 16 gold medals, four silvers and five bronzes to come first in the countries' standings at the 19th World Taekwon-do Championships.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Pushing Inter-Korean Authorities' Talks to Stalemate
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Pushing Inter-Korean Authorities' Talks to Stalemate
Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- It is a logical consequence of the persistent confrontation policy and arrogant and intentional moves of the south Korean authorities unwilling to see the genuine dialogue and improvement of relations between the north and the south that the first round of the north-south authorities' talks that had been provided with much effort came to a rupture.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Friday says:
					
					 Actually the DPRK did not pin much hope on the prospect of the inter-Korean authorities' talks as the south Korean authorities persisted in the confrontation with the compatriots in the north in breach of the August agreement while getting wordy about "dialogue".
					
					 The DPRK, however, made efforts to settle urgent and easy problems arising in the inter-Korean relations at the talks with the south side, out of desire to bring down the confrontation barrier and pave a broad avenue to national reunification at any cost.
					
					 The south side assumed completely different attitude at the talks, quite contrary to its vociferous solicitation that it could discuss any issue once the authorities' talks opened.
					
					 At the talks it persistently rejected the reasonable proposals of the DPRK and came out with a series of unimportant issues, which would be of no help to improving the inter-Korean relations and did not fit the nature of the talks.
					
					 In the end, it went so shameful as to say that it could not agree without the consent of the U.S.
					
					 Yet, it impudently trumpeted about the "three channels".
					
					 Such a situation goes to clearly prove that the inter-Korean relations can not improve even a little and nothing will be resolved even though the dialogue takes place as long as the south Korean authorities get frantic with dependence on outsiders and confrontation with the compatriots in the north.

articles.title: "State-compiled" History Textbook Opposed by S. Korean Teachers
articles.content:
"State-compiled" History Textbook Opposed by S. Korean Teachers
Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Wednesday and turned out in the second declaration on the situation calling for the withdrawal of the introduction of "state-compiled" history textbook and for the realization of democracy, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People.
					 The union said that the declaration has been signed by more than 16,000 teachers of over 3,530 schools so far.
					
					 Earlier, 21,379 teachers of 3,904 schools including the members of the union signed the 1st declaration on Oct. 29.
					
					 Speakers branded the present "regime" as a dictatorial one as it is setting back history and turning a deaf ear to the urgent demands of the people.
					
					 They stressed that they would wage a dynamic struggle to check the moves for reviving the "yusin" dictatorship and introducing the "state-compiled" history textbook.
					
					 A declaration on the situation was released at the press conference.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Slams U.S. and Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Slams U.S. and Japan
Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on Dec. 15 denouncing the U.S. for disturbing peace on the Korean Peninsula and Japan for denying the past crimes of aggression. 
					 At the meeting, speakers urged the U.S. to stop imposing sanctions against the DPRK and opt for dialogue.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The situation on the peninsula is aggravating owing to the U.S. moves to steadily put pressure upon the north in a bid to bring it down.
					
					 The deployment of THAAD in south Korea will escalate the military tension on the peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 The introduction of U.S. fighter will imperil the situation of the peninsula and bring profits to the U.S. munitions industries only.
					
					 Japan is watching for a chance to reinvade the peninsula, far from making an apology for aggression and colonial domination over Korea in the past. 
					
					 The U.S. is pressing south Korea to form a nexus with Japan in a bid to build south Korea-U.S.-Japan military alliance.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Army Plagued by Suicide
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Army Plagued by Suicide
Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- A soldier of the south Korean puppet army hung himself to death on Monday, according to MBC of south Korea. 
					 The dead body was found at a military depot of a unit in Kosong County, Kangwon Province of south Korea where he served only for no more than three months.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un Adopted by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un Adopted by Koreans in China
Beijing, December 17 (KCNA) -- A meeting for adopting a letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was held by the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China at the DPRK embassy in Beijing Wednesday on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were the chairperson of the Zhongnan Regional Association and Koreans in China.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They went round a photo of Kim Jong Un and pictures showing events for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea including the military parade and public procession of Pyongyang citizens.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Russians
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Russians
Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- There took place in Russia a lecture, seminar, round-table talks, an opening ceremony of the book, photo and fine art exhibition and film show on Dec. 10 and 11 on the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The secretary of the Regional Political Council of the Nakhodka City Branch of the Maritime Territory of the United Russia Party said Kim Jong Il was a great leader who developed the Workers' Party of Korea into an invincible party and led the Korean people to keep to the road of their choice despite the moves of the hostile forces to stifle the country.
					
					 The chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea praised him as the leader of the people who achieved unity and cohesion among the leader, party and popular masses and aroused the Korean people to the building of a thriving nation. 
					
					 The first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territory of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said Kim Jong Il devoted his all to uphold the cause of President Kim Il Sung and thus provided the Korean people with a firm foundation for building a thriving socialist country and achieving economic development.
					
					 The chairman of the Nakhodka Regional Committee of A Just Russia noted Kim Jong Il was a peerless statesman as he inspired the world progressives with conviction of victory by holding fast to the banner of socialism even in the ordeals of the setback of socialist movement.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary Observed by Media of Uruguay, DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary Observed by Media of Uruguay, DR Congo
Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Media of Uruguay and DR Congo marked the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Uruguayan paper La Juventud on Dec. 9 carried an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il's motto is to believe in people as in Heaven" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The paper said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il set the improvement of the people's living standard as a top priority and the highest goal and always made long journeys for field guidance to translate the people's ideal into a reality.
					
					 He continued to give field guidance in 2011, the last year of his great life.
					
					 It is by no means accidental that the Korean people writhed in bitter grief over his demise, startling the world.
					
					 The venerable image of Kim Jong Il as the tender-hearted father of the people will always be kept in the hearts of the Korean people.
					
					 Posted on the website of the news agency of DR Congo on Dec. 9 were articles sub-titled "Genius of ideology and theory" and "Great statesman for independence" under the headline of "Leader Kim Jong Il will always be alive in the hearts of the world progressives".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Introduced by Int'l Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Introduced by Int'l Organization
Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- The brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il was posted by the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain on its website on December 10.
					 A photo of Kim Jong Il inspecting a unit of the Korean People's Army was posted on the website.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia alimentos a Kim Yong Dok por su centesimo cumpleanos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia alimentos a Kim Yong Dok por su centesimo cumpleanos
Sariwon, 18 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio una mesa de alimentos a la centenaria Kim Yong Dok, moradora en la unidad de vecinos No. 12 del barrio Mangum de la ciudad de Sariwon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte.
					Nacida el 18 de diciembre del 4 (1915) de la Era Juche en una pobre familia campesina del distrito de Hwangju de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte, la anciana vivio con la tristeza de apatrida sufriendo las humillaciones y maltratos de toda indole por los imperialistas japoneses.
					
					Despues de la liberacion de la patria por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, ella pudo disfrutar de una vida digna y feliz. 
					
					Trabajo con abnegacion y despues de jubilacion hizo esfuerzos por contribuir a la produccion cerealera del pais. 
					
					Vive ahora con optimismo llevando una dieta equilibrada.
					
					Envio a sus hijos a los puestos militares y los dominios importantes encomendandoles a defender bien el regimen socialista.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita dia de independencia de Qatar
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita dia de independencia de Qatar
Pyongyang, 18 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 18 un mensaje de felicitacion al emir del Estado de Qatar, Tamim Bin Hamad Al-Thani, con motivo del dia de la independencia de este pais. 
					Convencido de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se desarrollaran mas, el remitente desea de todo corazon al destinatario buena salud y felicidad y al amistoso pueblo de Qatar mayor progreso y prosperidad.

articles.title: Registrada costumbre de preparacion de Kimchi de Corea como patrimonio cultural de mundo
articles.content:
Registrada costumbre de preparacion de Kimchi de Corea como patrimonio cultural de mundo
Pyongyang, 18 de diciembre (ACNC) -- La costumbre de preparacion de Kimchi de Corea fue registrada en la "Lista representativa de los patrimonios culturales intangibles de la humanidad" en la 10a reunion del comite intergubernamental para la proteccion de patrimonios culturales intangibles de la UNESCO, sesionada en Namibia del 30 de noviembre al 4 de diciembre.
					El subdirector de la Direccion de Preservacion de Patrimonios Nacionales (DPPN), Ro Chol Su dijo a la ACNC como sigue:
					
					El ano pasado, la cancion folklorica coreana "Arirang" fue registrada como patrimonio cultural intangible y en el presente, la costumbre de preparacion de Kimchi de Corea, lo que da alegria al pueblo coreano.
					
					Nuestros antecedentes inventaron un mejor metodo de almacenamiento de hortalizas en el otono para comerlas durante todo el invierno y hasta finales de la primavera del ano siguiente. Este metodo es precisamente la preparacion de Kimchi.
					
					Desde antiguedad, el pueblo coreano comia Kimchi durante todas las estaciones, considerandolo como una propia costumbre de vida alimentaria.
					
					En la primavera temprana preparaba con el nabo conservado el Kimchi de trozos de rabano, trozos de nabo condimentados y Kimchi de acelga, en el verano, trozos de pepino condimentados, pepino relleno, Kimchi de berenjena, Kimchi de perejil y otros y en el otono, Kimchi de rabano tierno, Kimchi de repollos enteros y Kimchi de nabo con poco pepino.
					
					Sobre todo, Kimchi elaborado en el invierno ocupa un importante lugar en la vida alimentaria de la nacion coreana.
					
					Si se prepara Kimchi, es igual al almacenamiento de hortalizas para 5 meses, o sea, desde noviembre hasta marzo del ano siguiente, razon por la cual la preparacion de Kimchi se consideraba como alimentos semestrales.
					
					Asi, la nacion coreana prestaba primordial atencion a la preparacion de Kimchi considerandolo como trabajo mas importante en un ano, de manera que en Corea se formo una tipica costumbre de preparacion de Kimchi nunca vista en otros paises.
					
					Cuando se prepara Kimchi, los habitantes se ayudan mutuamente entre los vecinos, parientes o companeras.

articles.title: Jugadores coreanos obtienen mas de 90  medallas de oro en juegos internacionales
articles.content:
Jugadores coreanos obtienen mas de 90  medallas de oro en juegos internacionales
Pyongyang, 18 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Los deportistas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ganaron casi 250 medallas incluyendo mas de 90 medallas de oro en los torneos internacionales efectuados en este ano.
					Las futbolistas crearon el mito deportivo de lograr las victorias sucesivas en la Copa Femenina de Este de Asia de 2015 de la Federacion de las Asociaciones de Futbol del Este de Asia.
					
					Kim Hye Gyong ocupo el primer lugar en el XV Campeonato Asiatico de Maraton y la Competencia de Maraton de Hong Kong de 2015.
					
					Kim Kuk Hyang vencio a todos los fuertes mundiales en el salto de la plataforma fija de 10 m (f) del XVI Campeonato Mundial de la Federacion Internacional de Natacion, efectuado en julio en Kazan de Rusia.
					
					Tambien, las futbolistas salieron victoriosas en el campeonato regional (Asia Oriental) de futbol sub-14 de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol 2015 y el Campeonato Sub-16 de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol 2015.
					
					Por otra parte, los jugadores lograron los exitos sobresalientes en el Campeonato Mundial de Levantamiento de Pesas 2015 efectuado en Estados Unidos.
					
					Om Yun Chol ocupo el primer lugar volviendo a batir un record mundial al levantar 171kg en la envion de la division de 56kg (M).
					
					Ri Se Gwang ocupo el primer lugar en el potro masculino del 46o Campeonato Mundial de Gimnasia de Aparatos, efectuado en Gran Bretana, siendo doble campeon mundial.
					
					Pak Jong Ju, Kang Yong Mi y Kwak Chol ocuparon respectivamente el primer lugar en el Campeonato Mundial de Jovenes de Levantamiento de Pesas 2015, en las barras asimetricas de la Copa de Retadores de Gimnasia de Aparatos de la Federacion Internacional de Gimnasia 2015 y en la competencia internacional de boxeo Konstantin Korotkov.
					
					Los taekwondoistas coreanos ocuparon el primer lugar en el ranking de los paises obteniendo las 16 medallas de oro, las 4 de plata y las 5 de cobre en XIX Campeonato Mundial de Taekwondo en septiembre del 104 (2015) de la Era Juche.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena a autoridades surcoreanas que frustraron dialogo
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena a autoridades surcoreanas que frustraron dialogo
Pyongyang, 18 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Las primeras conversaciones de las autoridades Norte-Sur, preparadas a duras penas, quedaron frustradas sin lograr ningun exito, lo cual es un resultado inevitable de la invariable politica conflictiva y de las arrogantes e intencionales maniobras destructivas de las autoridades surcoreanas, que no desean el dialogo sincero ni la mejora de relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas.
					Adelanta asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de hoy y prosigue:
					
					De hecho, no atribuimos tanta esperanza a la perspectiva del dialogo dado que las autoridades surcoreanas recurren con frenesi a la confrontacion fratricida a contrapelo del espiritu del acuerdo de agosto pasado.
					
					Sin embargo, a partir de la unica voluntad de derrumbar cueste lo que cueste la muralla conflictiva y abrir el ancho camino de reunificacion, nos sentamos cara a cara con la parte surena e hicimos ingentes esfuerzos por solucionar desde los problemas apremiantes y faciles pendientes en las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Pero, la parte surcoreana, que solicitaba obstinadamente el dialogo diciendo que abordaria cualesquier problemas en las conversaciones, tomo la posicion completamente diferente en las platicas.
					
					Y dando vista gorda a nuestras propuestas justas e imparciales, insistieron persistentemente en los problemas insignificantes al mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas e inconvenientes al rango de las conversaciones de autoridades.
					
					Y finalmente, se porto vergonzosamente diciendo que no puede acordar ningun problema sin el premiso de Estados Unidos. Y atrevidamente vocifero sobre las supuestas "tres vias".
					
					La realidad ha demostrado claramente que mientras que las autoridades surcoreanas se recurren desesperadamente a la dependencia de las fuerzas extranjeras y la confrontacion fratricida nunca podran mejorarse las relaciones intercoreanas ni seran logrados ningun resultado aunque se quede abierto el dialogo.
